description.raw:
Refactor and implement the option to send several different compiling jobs into the same orchestration pipeline.

All them are running in parallel and run as a block together with the pre/post set build status jobs. The final jenkins result for the pipeline job is set to the worse result of the testing jobs.

With the inclusion of the parallel block we lost the ability to define stages inside the parallel block, so no more different stages for set status/building. Although the current visualisation is far from perfect, I think that it will improve with jenkins2 and upcoming versions.

This PR integrates the gazebo-nvidia and gazebo-no-gpu jobs to serve as example:

  * [Testing run #4 is complete](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any_test_multi2/). Only one stage.
  * [Testing run #5 is running](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any_test_multi2/) with two stages (current pull request code).

title: Integrate several jobs in orchestration
